title: AAC: climbing accidents and major new climbs
subtitle: Articles from the American Alpine Club publications.
description:
Articles from the American Alpine Club publications: 
- AAJ: the most comprehensive worldwide source of information on major new climbs - published since 1929 
- ANAC: documenting the most significant and teachable climbing accidents - published annually since 1948

resources.description: Articles from the American Alpine Club publications - can be either AAJ or ANAC publication.

fields.name: type
fields.description: A designated category that the article belongs to

fields.name: publication
fields.description: The publication the article belongs to (can be either ANAC or AAJ)

fields.name: location
fields.description: Geographical location of the event covered by the article

fields.name: climb_year
fields.description: Year that the event of the article took place

fields.name: publication_year
fields.description: Year that the event of the article got published

fields.name: link_to_pdf
fields.description: URL of the associated PDF attachment

resources.name: articles

name: articles
